origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.calculate_premium', 'description': 'This function calculates the premium for an insurance policy based on the insurance type, age of the applicant, whether they are a smoker, and the coverage amount.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'insuranceType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of insurance, e.g., life, auto, home.'}, {'name': 'age', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The age of the person applying for the policy.'}, {'name': 'smoker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Whether the applicant is a smoker, yes or no.'}, {'name': 'coverageAmount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The amount of coverage desired.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'premium', 'description': 'The calculated monthly premium for the insurance policy.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.calculate_premium, 它的参数输入如下: 'insuranceType'是'life', 'age'是'30', 'smoker'是'no', 'coverageAmount'是'250000'.
